name: webhooked
description: A simple express server designed to receive and verify webhook requests and execute scripts.

scripts.build: coffee --output dist --compile ./*.coffee && cp ./package.json dist && cp -r ./scripts dist && cp -r ./env_scripts dist
scripts.daemonize: npm run build && pm2 start dist/index.js --name 'tiny-ci'

author: daniel@lytedev.io
